item.title: Understanding TLS Passthrough and Other Features of AWS NLB
item.description: TLS Passthrough with AWS NLB # To setup TLS passthrough with NLB, follow these steps: Listen: TCP - can be 80 or 443 Target: TCP - 443 Backend: HTTPS on 443 Here are some interesting features of NLB:
